org.js4ms.io.channel

Interface OutputChannel<MessageType>

  • Type Parameters:
    MessageType - The message object type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    MessageOutput<MessageType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InterleavedPacketOutputChannel, OutputChannelAdapter, OutputChannelFilter, OutputChannelMap, OutputChannelPipe, OutputChannelTee, OutputChannelTransform, TcpPacketOutputChannel, UdpOutputChannel, UdpPacketOutputChannel

    public interface OutputChannel<MessageType>
extends MessageOutput<MessageType>
    Interface exposed by all message output channels objects. A message output channel provides the means for sending a message to a message sink via the MessageOutput.send(Object, int) method.
    Author:
    Greg Bumgardner (gbumgard)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.js4ms.io.channel.MessageOutput

        EOM

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes this channel and optionally closes any channels wrapped or attached to this channel.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.js4ms.io.channel.MessageOutput

        send

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()
           throws IOException,
                  InterruptedException
        Closes this channel and optionally closes any channels wrapped or attached to this channel.
        Throws:
        IOException - The close operation has failed.
        IllegalStateException - The close request is not allowed in current state.
        InterruptedException - The calling thread was interrupted before the close operation could complete.
